alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade County through 530 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Bear Butte State Park, or 16 miles northeast of Sturgis, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hereford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
